entities.name: tom
entities.description: Tom is mentioned as someone Harry wishes he could talk to about his crimes.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is on the verge of shouting a warning and later talks to Dumbledore.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as someone whose hand Harry suspects of moving towards his pocket and wand.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the one who has a hand on Harry's arm and later talks to him about Voldemort's return.

relationships.description: Harry suspects Voldemort of moving his hand towards his pocket and wand.
Dumbledore has a supportive role by having a hand on Harry's arm.
Voldemort is the target of Harry's suspicion and warning.
Dumbledore seems to have some influence over Voldemort, as he is able to make him return.
